overview:
Jason Korkin, 31, currently is President of Safe Data Technologies, LLC; an open source technologies based firm specializing in web application development and custom voice over IP solutions using Asterisk and FreeSwitch.

As a serial entrepreneur, Jason has founded several successful and profitable Internet based businesses including:

  • A Web hosting/dedicated server and co-location company
  • An Online data backup service natively supporting Windows, Mac and Linux
  • A Fax to email service with nationwide and toll free number access
  • MXFilter, an outsourced SPAM/anti-virus filtering solution
  • Email deliverability analytics and monitoring services including: BlackListCheck.com and EmailToolsOnline.com in its portfolio.

As co-founder of Spdy.me a revenue sharing and link shortening service with Twitter integration, Jason developed the entire solution.

At StuffBuff Inc, Jason serves as Chief Technology Officer, directing the company’s overall technology infrastructure and development activities to support its web presence.

Jason specializes in project management, systems administration, web application development and custom Asterisk development.

Jason attended Merrimack College and the University of New Hampshire with a focus in Computer Science and Business Administration.
